title: Calories in Texas Roadhouse Roll
meta_description: Learn calories in Texas Roadhouse roll, including macros like carbs, protein, fat, and sodium, plus tweaks and FAQs for better understanding.
assumptions: Fresh baked yeast dinner roll (~60 g) from Texas Roadhouse, served with 1 pat honey cinnamon butter.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, portion size, and butter amount. Values are estimates; check with the restaurant for exact info.

quick_answer.text: One Texas Roadhouse roll with honey cinnamon butter provides ~300 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Texas Roadhouse roll without butter?
faqs.a: About 200 kcal for the plain roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Texas Roadhouse roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 40 g carbs per roll with butter, including 8 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is the Texas Roadhouse roll high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 300 mg sodium per roll due to the dough and butter.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Texas Roadhouse roll?
Does the honey cinnamon butter add many calories?
faqs.a: Yes, it adds about 100 kcal from fat and sugars.
